title: Trigger
lyrics:
Ojig han bal gwanyeogcheoleom nan neol
Gidaligo iss-eul ppun oh oh
Naega neomgyeojun gwonlyeog neoui sonkkeut-e trigger oh
Uli sijag-ilan nega haneun geos
Naega hal su issneun geos-eun eobs-eo

Ulin neomu giul-eojin geol

Oh baby ojig neoui gyeoljeongman nam-a



Naleul gyeonwo dang-gyeobwa neoege nan sseuleojyeo oh oh

Nae simjang-eul majchwobwa wanjeonhage gajyeobwa oh oh



Eodideun budam eobs-i sswa

Chong-al-eun myeongbun-igo naega gaseo maj-eul geoya

Geuleoni eoseo pull a trigger

Geomjil dang-gyeo swieo Cut it cut it

Killâ€™em all nae mal deul-eo

Da doen sinalio woo

Pal-eul hwaljjag beollin chaelo

Neo hanaman eungsihae nan

Touch down haneun sungan

Palgwa dali da ne geoya

Nal gajyeo da click clack pow



Jjalb-eun hansungan-e ppaesgyeobeolin geol

Naui jag-eun sepo hanakkaji

Mulyeoghage neomgyeobeolin geol

Oh baby neoui son-e naui jeonbuleul



Naleul gyeonwo dang-gyeobwa neoege nan sseuleojyeo oh oh

Nae simjang-eul majchwobwa wanjeonhage gajyeobwa oh oh



Throw me down

Sum swil sudo eobsge salojab-ajwo

Naega gidalineun mal eoseo naege haejwo

Throw me down

Sum swil sudo eobsge salojab-ajwo

Naega gidalineun mal eoseo naege haejwo



Naege neoui jibjung-eul naege neoui seontaeg-eul

Nal eotteohge hal geonji du nun sog-en naega bichyeo

Dan hanaui gwanyeog-i doegileul gidaligo iss-eo



Jeonghwaghage jeogyeoghae naege neoui heunjeog-eul oh oh

Dol-ikil suga eobsdolog geobuhal suga eobsdolog

Eoseo naleul gwantonghae bunmyeonghage gajyeobwa oh oh

Imi naleul da deonjyeoss-eo dal-anaji moshae



Throw me down

Sum swil sudo eobsge salojab-ajwo

Naega gidalineun mal eoseo naege haejwo

Throw me down

Sum swil sudo eobsge salojab-ajwo

Naega gidalineun mal eoseo naege haejwo
